post:
`Hello rahul,

 

We've been hard at work recently setting up a few new locations (more to come!), as well as making numerous improvements in the background to better serve our clients.

 

We'll be rolling these out gradually, but firstly, welcome to our 2015 expansions!

 

First on the list is our new Sydney, Australia location. We're located within Equinix Sydney (SY3), one of the most well connected datacenters in the country. We also happen to be locals here :)

 

We've setup a great network here and have included a few special introductory offers through one of our sister brands below.

 

VPS Offer:

 

OpenVZ

2 CPU

1GB RAM / 1GB VSwap

21GB RAID10 HDD space

300GB @ Gigabit port

1x IPv4 Address

8x IPv6 Addresses

$5/month or $50/year

 

Order via https://www.cloudshards.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=209

 

OpenVZ

1 CPU

256MB RAM / 256MB VSwap

8GB RAID10 HDD space

175GB @ Gigabit port

1x IPv4 Address

8x IPv6 Addresses

$30/year

 

Order via https://www.cloudshards.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=210

 

Bigger packages are available, please get in touch!


 

(All prices in USD, GST will apply if you're based in Australia.)

 

At this location, we'll be providing IP Transit, Colocation, VPS and Dedicated Servers.

 

If you'd like more information or have questions, be sure to submit a sales ticket!

 

More to come!

 

- The Query Foundry Team

  Driving changes for 2015!`
